body_html:
So seems the issue was due to word dropout function where I am making a copy of the tensor to mask some of the inputs. Not sure why though.

data = inputs.data.clone()
mask = t.from_numpy(np.random.binomial(1, p=word_drop, size=tuple(data.size())).astype('uint8'))
mask = mask.cuda()
data[mask] = self.UNK_idx
return Variable(data)

So seems the issue was due to word dropout function where I am making a copy of the tensor to mask some of the inputs. Not sure why though.
data = inputs.data.clone()

body:
So seems the issue was due to word dropout function where I am making a copy of the tensor to mask some of the inputs. Not sure why though. 

```
data = inputs.data.clone()
mask = t.from_numpy(np.random.binomial(1, p=word_drop, size=tuple(data.size())).astype('uint8'))
mask = mask.cuda()
data[mask] = self.UNK_idx
return Variable(data)
```
